select ei.id, ei.user_id, ei.score, ei.content, ei.images, ei.order_code, ei.create_date, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages, ui.phone, roi.start_date, roi.end_date, roi.total_price, di.name, di.content, di.model, di.brand, dti.name as typeName, dti.images as typeImages from evaluate_info ei left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ei.user_id) left join rent_order_info roi on (roi.code = ei.order_code) left join device_info di on (di.id = roi.device_id) left join device_type_info dti on (dti.id = di.type_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluateInfo.userName},'%')
AND ei.order_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluateInfo.orderCode},'%')
AND di.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluateInfo.deviceName},'%')
AND ui.`user_id` = #{evaluateInfo.userId}
order by ei.create_date desc
